headline: Why Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN) is One of the Top Gene Therapy Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds
summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) is one of the top gene therapy stocks to buy according to hedge funds. Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) announced on February 24 that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved Dupixent® (dupilumab) for the treatment of adult and pediatric patients aged 6 years and older with allergic fungal rhinosinusitis with […]
